text:
Answer
Political contributions support political parties and/or election campaigns in their respective
political causes, and they can be direct or indirect. Indirect political contributions are made on
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 242 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
behalf of a company by an intermediary organisation, such as a think tank, a business association
